The Lord desires to lead us all gently and consistently. It is the enemy who seeks to drive us to extremes. He would be pleased to see the conscientious advocates of health reform require that which God does not require. He would be pleased to see them placing on their own tables. . . 


                                    -326- 

food that is not acceptable.--Letter 39, 1901, p. 1. (To Brother and Sister Farnsworth, May 29, 1901.)
